name: My Plastic Tree
description:
A hardcore physics-based arcade game in which you can make your very own plastic tree! 

How high can you build your tree before the acid rain melts it down?

  • Press A/D or ←/→ to tilt
  • Hold W or SPACE to propel and build the tree
  • Press R to restart

You'll see the snapshot whenever you reach a new checkpoint!

How many gameObjects can your PC handle?

#gmtkjam #gmtk2021
